website_summaries.verdict: Durable, warm, and stylish, this it a top choice in a casual boot style. Notably, the boots tend to be snug at first.
pros: Toasty warm construction and thick lining
Sturdy and versatile, these boots look great with jeans and leggings
They stand up to years of use and have a durable rubber sole
cons: Boots may feel snug until they are broken in
They require waterproofing treatment if you plan to wear them in wet conditions

customer_reviews.title: BEARPAW is a quality boot and a cost effective alternative to UGG
customer_reviews.text: BEARPAW is a quality boot and a cost effective alternative to UGG (for my 8 year old daughter). We have been buying them for a few years now, 1~2 pairs per season. We loved the color of these boots but unfortunately they are too small and not the size 5 that we ordered. In the photo I placed them heel to heel with a locally bought size 5 BEARPAW boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaws delivers again!
customer_reviews.text: I once read a comparison of Bearpaws to Uggs, it said, "80% of the boot for 40% of the price. I am going to stand by that, I think. I own like ten pairs of these things, in a variety of styles and colors and I never have regretted a single purchase. Anyway, I actually bought these for my husband, he like to wear them with jeans and also like slippers, his ancient Uggs finally gave out and he wanted taller boots anyway. So,....size 12 (women's) Bearpaws fit him. His own paws are 10-10.5, so I knew they would. He is delighted, I am delighted, Amazon gets money, Bearpaws gets money, and you get the picture. ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Darkwoodriding

customer_reviews.title: They're 100% fake!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They're fake!! Glue showing all over the soles, logo in back is very crooked and the stitching looks like a 5 yr old did it! Thread hanging out and all messed up. They are 100% knock offs and bad ones at that. Do not order!! Companys name started with sunny, can't recall the rest but unless you want 20$ boots that'll last a month dont buy them here.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Marhefka

customer_reviews.title: Impressed right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. I was looking to replace a similar pair of boots that I bought from another store long ago. I wore those boots all the time and loved them but they were worn out and no longer sold. I’m so glad I found these, they’re even better! I wear an 8 and ordered an 8, fits great. Furry inside is very plush and soft and warm. I will be buying more in other colors. This one is charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: mhawk

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tan pair 10/2018, wore them All the time during winter. The bottoms broke apart where you crease to walk 2 years later (Alot of life in them) & bought the black ones now bc I absolutely Love them! Can wear without socks bc they're fuzzy inside, I'm 5'7 & go half way to knees so perfect. I wear an 8, got an 8 & there's no room for growth when you get them but they stretch out in the foot over time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Animal Fur and Scum on Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a non bear paw box. They said on the box that the original box had been damaged in transit. The boots had clearly been worn. The toe was already worn. Their was scum on the boot of the shoes along with a copious amount of animal hair. The inserts that normally come in a pair of boots were missing. I got a replacement pair and they too were in a similar condition as the first. I bough a pair of bear paws before, and they were new. Do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear #3

customer_reviews.title: They look, fit and feel great.
customer_reviews.text: Tired of my old, tired fake Uggs, I ordered these in olive simply because they were less than $40, my size and I needed a pair of pull on boots. I was pleased to see that they are lined with wool and the suede is pretty good. Seams are tight and the boot looks like it might not separate from the bottom any time soon. I treated them before wearing, hoping to keep them looking decent and maybe a little weather proof. So far so good. As for color, it is a nice shade of dark olive.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia A Borst

customer_reviews.title: Warm and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these once and returned because I though they were made too small with tge way my toes felt. I researched the product once again and it stated they would loosen up with time and wear. So, I ordered 3 pair, one in Black, grey and hickory. The feel so warm on my feet and look stylish with anything and price is reasonable. I am glad I gave them a second chance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, wonderful boots.
customer_reviews.text: Oh, I just adore these boots. I debated getting Uggs, but decided to keep my life savings instead. These are wonderful. Very comfy. Very warm. Very cute (if you like the look). I purchased the hickory/champagne color and it's true to the image. What I was most surprised by is the quality - very well made and I think they'll last a long time. I feel like I really lucked out with these, a wonderful value for the price. I'd recommend them to anyone. PLEASE NOTE: These are not a dainty boot. The toe is rather bulky, but not bulkier than I would expect for this style. Just something to note if you're concerned about that at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H.

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a month..
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited did you get these boots they were great for the first month. I have now had them for exactly 2 months and the side of them down by the bottom is ripping open so they don't even keep my feet warm anymore I'm really sad that they didn't last long won't be buying again
customer_reviews.author: A Carson

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected TTS
customer_reviews.text: I’m always a true 7 1/2 shoe, so that’s what I ordered in these boots. They slid on easily and fit comfortably. I wonder as time goes on and I wear them in if they might end up being too big. They were exactly what I was looking for. Soft and warm. I’d order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay C

customer_reviews.title: Warm, little loose inside, bottom inside faux fur wears quickly, replacement insole a good idea
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me warm during our snowy and freezing days. My foot flops around some, the bottom fur wore quickly, but ordered the Uggs insole replacement and is now a nice snug and comfortable fit. Need to order another color.
customer_reviews.author: Pinklaw

customer_reviews.title: Warm boots!
customer_reviews.text: I like my boots. They are warm and comfortable. The only complaint I have is that they have wide toe box that sometimes they feel too loose. I thought of wearing thick wool socks but then that’ll only stretch the toe box further.
customer_reviews.author: amazongirl

customer_reviews.title: I was blown away by how incredibly comfortable these boots are
customer_reviews.text: Fantasic boot!! All natural materials do not make your feet too hot! I was blown away by how incredibly comfortable these boots are. I never want to take them off! I wear an 8 or 8.5 depending on the fit of the shoe. I bought an 8 and im glad I did! It was snug at first but once the padding settled, it sort of formed to my foot and fits extremely well. I absolutely love this boot and cant wait to ger another color.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie S

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: My ideal shoe size is 11.5 US but that is hard to find. Size 12 is usually big for me but I figured I would wear thick socks. Nope. These are tight and narrow with no sock on. They don’t hurt so they’ll work for chasing my kids around outside but I definitely wouldn’t want to wear them all day. Disappointed. The boot seems good quality construction and material.
customer_reviews.author: K fam

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and warmth 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bearpaws! Had a pair for years that were upcycled from a friend and when they finally bit the dust no other slipper could compare. Love wearing these without socks to go to yoga, run out to the garage, just lounging in the house or yard, or even for the unexpected walk. They are the best. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are not only great looking from the outside but they are so comfortable in the inside. I could wear them all day. The price is right for the quality of the boots. I don’t know why anyone would pay buco bucks on Uggs ?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were another brand but lasted for ages and were super glued together by the end
customer_reviews.text: I beat the crud out of my old boots. They were another brand but lasted for ages and were super glued together by the end. Figured it was time for a new pair. Tried the Bear Paw version this go around and so far super happy. These are sweat your tail off warm and I love the color. So far no issues with the sole or other parts of the boot separating and I have worn them everyday since I got them (a couple months now).
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Pulford

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was a little unsure about these til they got here cause some of the reviews but I can say that these are the best boots I’ve had. I’ve had every kind of ugg boot they make and these have a much better sole in my opinion and for way cheaper than uggs. These types of boots do get salt and water stains quite easily (My uggs got them the worst) so I would recommend getting some type of water proofing spray. Other than that they are perfect for cold weather. I highly recommend these boots. They’re a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 9 but I ordered a 9 1/2 since reading the reviews this is my second pair and I absolutely love them they came fast and great price it’s all I wear in the winter I have a black pair and now brown and the black pair I have had for years and they still look brand new such great boots
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots. Feel well made
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived, walking around the house in August tryin them on. Beautiful boots. Feel well made. Love the green! Only complaint is they're a little big- normally wear 9 1/2, other reviews said order 1/2 size up. I purchased a 10 No need to. My normal size would've fit perfectly. Like them enough to wear thick socks & keep. First pair of Bearpaws but won't be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I got my boots on January 2nd 2020. I absolutely LOVED them. Loved the color and they fit perfectly. It is now March 22nd 2020 and my boots are split on the souls. I've had walmart brand boots last longer. I'm a 30 year old woman. I dont wear them everyday. I don't do anything but go to work at a DESK job. This is unacceptable. I have been wearing bearpaw boots for years. I've NEVER had a paid do this to me in such a short time frame. Bearpaw must be using a cheaper sole now. I'm livid.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Money

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly well-made
customer_reviews.text: They may feel slightly snug at first but they’ll stretch out once your feet mesh into the fur. I’ve bought these boots before and wore them (no joke) 80% of the year and they lasted me for 10 YEARS!!! Don’t waste your money on Ugg’s - the price is affordable and quality of this brand is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit! I'm a comfortable size 8 and 8 fit fine. Solid bottom. not cheap made.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bearpaw Boots. This is prolly my 4th pair. They are comfortable, well built and way more affordable than other brands that will remain nameless. My last pair was black and I had them for a few years when it was time to get a new pair I wanted to try the Charcoal color. I was not disappointed. I can wear them with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole,  Va Beach

customer_reviews.title: So cute, love the olive color too!
customer_reviews.text: Cute boots! They look great and I love the color, but I just don't like the feel of walking in the tall boot. I know, sounds crazy, but I guess I prefer the shorter style- it works for me and bends better around my ankle when I step. Bought the same color in a short style, even though I really like the look of the tall ones.
customer_reviews.author: LaniK

customer_reviews.title: Tall boots!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this boot as it has fully rubber soles so you don’t slip and slide on the fake soles most boots have. They are very tall and quite warm, so keep that in mind. I bought them as we were experiencing feet of snowfall and wanted something taller. Also for below zero temps/like -20+. We have had a milder winter than expected this year in ND so I haven’t worn them as much as I expected so can’t quite comment on the quality during day to day use yet.
customer_reviews.author: Madelynn Haider

customer_reviews.title: Great price for my Bearpaw addiction.
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots for a great bargain. Compared to what these boots cost in stores I got them for half the price here on Amazon. Plus they don't sell this color in stores too often. In stores expect to pay between $60-$70 even for the warm weather. They look great with yoga pants. They will fit a little snug when you first put them on your feet but after awhile they will form around your feet. BUT and I say this good advice. before you wear em in public remember to spray some waterproof spray on them. That way your boots don't become spotted.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Warm feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of bear paw boots in different styles. They are very comfortable and they keep my feet very warm. Just keep in mind they have no traction! But I still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Dutches

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The first time I wore them they were quite snug but I heard they stretch a little. I’ve worn them a few times and they do seem to be stretching. Now they’re Very comfortable, no socks required.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mc

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots, but a little disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, but was disappointed because they run a size small, & I had to return them. However, I have reordered them in a size 11! They seem to be made of good quality, the indigo color I chose is great, & they will be really warm for me to wear next winter. However, I am not happy with having the $6 shipping fee deducted from my refund. I could not exchange them, & if the boots had been a true size 10, I would not have had to return them, & taken a loss. In reality, I am now paying the shipping to reorder them!
customer_reviews.author: Dee D.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Had to return and Order new ones. 9 was too small for my mom and she never wears anything over a 9. Had to order different ones they didn’t have these in a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Kt.Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. A great less expensive alternative to uggs. Made well. Super comfortable. Make sure to size up...I normally wear a 6-1/2 to a 7 in shoes but an 8 in these boots is a perfect fit. I’ll for sure buy more colors!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots But Run Large
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They're warm, comfortable and the quality is every bit as good as their very expensive UGG counterparts. But the sizing is off. I wear a 7 1/2 so as recommended by Bearpaw, I ordered a size 8 which was huge. I reordered a size smaller in 7, and they're perfect. Bearpaw recommends a tighter fit so as the fleece adjusts to your feet, they don't slip. For me, the smaller size was snug but not tight.
customer_reviews.author: Sable

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I have now,3 pairs of bearpaws and I really love them.they are as nice as UGGs,for a much cheaper price,but are really well made.love this color,too
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great for big calves
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I have several Bearpaws and really like the affordable brand. These tall boots fit my 17.25 inch calves. Hard to find. Warm and fit great. Might be too big opening for normal to thin calves. But for the bigger calves, you will love these.
customer_reviews.author: happy with him

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 8 even though I’m a size 7 because I was nervous about it fitting well. I am glad I order a size up because the 8 fits perfect! I love the style and it’s extremely comfortable to wear during the fall. I recently got caught out in the rain and my boots were soaked! Working two hours the water was all gone and left no dirty marks or residue on the material of the boots! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Talulah13

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend and would also buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and the quality of these boots. Made of excellent material which is real suede. The fit and comfort that you would expect for this higher price.
customer_reviews.author: lillian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. I've owned UGGs and these are just as great if not better. They are very well lined and fit snugly around the calf. I got them in black, the color is rich, NOT at all dull. The sole is a sturdy thick rubber so no worries about slippery surfaces. I plan to wear them with leggings. I'm a 6.5, based on reviews I decided to get the 6. It fits just right, a little tight with a sock on but I know the shearling lining will start to wear after a few uses. I'm very happy with this purchase and will probably order them in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOASTY WARM!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly soft inside and incredibly WARM after being properly sealed with spray! Glad I purchased the tall ones. Just this morning I walked through 6" of snow in 1 degree F weather and came in with dry and toasty tootsies! I would definately recommend! Only suggestion I would make, is if you need arch support, you will have to add it. These are flat inside.
customer_reviews.author: emunah

customer_reviews.title: I do love the boots
customer_reviews.text: I do love the boots, but I wish they came in half sizes. I am an 8.5 so I ordered the next size up. They are a little big, but with good socks it works. The boot is very very warm and can feel a bit heavy toward the end of the day. They look great, but I would have liked the shorter boot only because these are very wide at the top and difficult to get boot cut jeans over them. They look better with skinny jeans tucked in. Definitly a good boot though.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Mom

customer_reviews.title: The truth!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time making a purchase...Both purchases were excellent. The boots were in perfect condition, brand new, no issues at all. My boots look the same as all the other pics showing it’s brand new condition!!! Of course I’m buying again in other colors!
customer_reviews.author: lilsaintclg

customer_reviews.title: They are AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are warm, well made and feel amazing on my feet. I totally love them!!!! I will definitely order some for my daughter and grand daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta  Hallesy

customer_reviews.title: Kept my feet warm and comfortable. The color is just what I expected on ...
customer_reviews.text: I've seen friends wear the Bearpaw winter boots and have been looking around. I saw this at Amazon and the price was right. The delivery was on time. The boot came as expected. Kept my feet warm and comfortable. The color is just what I expected on the Grey. I like it that I recommended this to a friend. She asked me to order it for her, resulting to another order in a different size. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: JesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Just like my Uggs... But cheaper!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Ugg brand shoes like this, but decided to give Bearpaw a try. The 8 Bearpaw fits exactly like an 8 Ugg (women's), which I was hoping. I normally wear an 8.5 women's and this is perfect. My foot is a little on the wide size, but these are snuggly-- not tight-fitting. They are made well, and really remind me of my Uggs but are only a fraction of the cost. I could wear them around all day, but they don't have much arch support so if you need that you would have to put an insert inside.
customer_reviews.author: natpat

customer_reviews.title: warm and comfy... PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Got them last week and started wearing them every day since then. They keep My feet warm in the cold Nebraska winter and they are also very comfy. I wear them mostly at school so I don't walk that much but I could see myself wearing them all day. The fur is very soft and warm. I would definitely give them a try. I can't compare them to Uggs since I don't have any, but since they're $40 and not $150-200 like other brands, I think it's worth it to give them a shot. I followed what they said in the size charts for the sizing and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: silvia

customer_reviews.title: Ehh. Not the same.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at a higher price a couple years ago and everything was gravy. I purchased them again, same size but now almost $10 cheaper. These newer ones fit bigger and seem to be made a bit more cheaply. The quality doesn't seem the same. I'm a bit dissapointed, I'll only wear this to run to the market or to walk the dog. Otherwise they'll stay in the closet. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: shelrox

customer_reviews.title: These are warm!!! and comfortable but not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get sheepskin inserts for these boots when the given inserts wore thin from wear. I wear these boots all winter except for in the slush, I have waterproof boots for that.
customer_reviews.author: leslie benjamin

customer_reviews.title: World's most comfortable slipper boot.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of this particular boot I have owned. These have become my ultimate comfy footwear for cold weather. Super soft, warm, simple, and durable.
customer_reviews.author: David Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have a very difficult time finding size 12 shoes that fit properly. Disappointed again. The vamp (the part of the ankle that transitions from the top of foot to lower leg) is designed in an odd sort of way.
customer_reviews.author: TeachingMama2

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these my favorite color but they are very warm as well. They fit snug and I do not have to wear socks and my feet are very warm. I think I bought a half size down so that I could have a snuggly fit and it worked out fine. The price was affordable and nowhere near the price of uggs.
customer_reviews.author: Royalty

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot even for pre-teens
customer_reviews.text: Bought this boot for my 12 year old daughter. She LOVES them. Very comfortable. She is a size 6/6.5 womens and I ordered a size 8 womens as I read that they run small. The 8 fit great with some wiggle room as she grows. The only downside was that I ordered Black Champagne and received Chocolate Champagne. My daughter decided to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Lundell

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Cute Winter Boots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these since they had been on one of my wishlists forever, when the price had dropped I said why not and went on and ordered them. In Michigan you must have some sort of warm winter boot and while I have quite a few pairs of Uggs this particular style of bearpaw work just fine for me. Make you use the spray and your feet will be fine in the cold weather. I prefer the taller ones to keep my pants dry since the snow can get pretty high here some days.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Maria

customer_reviews.title: More of a Mustard Color
customer_reviews.text: The color is a muted yellow, not a primary color yellow. More of a mustard color. Love BearPaws. Fit well, warm and b/c I own a few other pairs, this just expanded the colors/styles I already own. Over the years, BearPaw has not messed with the sizing so I have never had a problem when ordering these online regarding the fit. Very happy abt that.
customer_reviews.author: RCL

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I wear a 7-1/2 and bought an 8 because I generally wear two pair of socks in the winter and I have high arches. The fit was perfect and did not bind across the top of my arch. The best is the WARMTH!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sole broke
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in these as a paid a decent amount for them. I’ve only had these since October and I’ve maybe worn them 7 or 8 times and the last time I wore them they started making a swishing sound in the heal of the right boot and it feels like I’m waking on rocks!! I’m by no means over weight and can see no reason why this would happen. I can’t even wear them and Amazon is telling me I’m outside of the return window, of course!! Very upset bcs I love these boots but now I’m stuck with them and can no longer wear them...
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would get a pair of these boots until my sister in law said she lives in her "uggs" . Well I won't pay those outrageous prices for a boot when I can get a great pair of Bear Paws. My sister in law was surprised when she put on my Bear Paws stating "these are just like my uggs " . So for all your financial conscious people who won't or don't pay top dollar, and labels don't make you ... You found a excellent product here .. They are true to size and I LOVE them . Great for Buffalo NY weather !
customer_reviews.author: Simply Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: Shop elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: These can’t possibly be bear paws. I’ve only had them for a month and a half and they are busting at the sides. I feel every bit of snow/slush on the ground when I wear these, might as well walk bare foot. I've owned a lot of bear paw boots over the years and I’ve never had this issue before. Completely unsatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Minor

customer_reviews.title: Very warm, great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, nice colors. The sizing seems very large to me; I usually wear an 8.5-9 in winter boots so ordered a 9 and my feet were swimming in them. I exchanged them for size 7, which fits great w/o socks. I took off a star because they're winter boots and the soles aren't very grippy (whose idea was that?) so I may have to wear yak-traks with them when the weather turns slippery. However, overall an excellent buy and a warm and good-looking boot.
customer_reviews.author: JBS

customer_reviews.title: Color is beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving these boots a 5 star rating!! They are the most comfortable boots I have ever purchased! Had bought them in black in a size 10. They bothered my big toe on my left foot a tad (Have an in-grown toenail issue I constantly battle!) (TMI?), but I still liked them. They have stretched a bit with wear. I bought the size 11 because that is all that was left in the red. Now the right boot is just a bit large, but my left foot is in heaven! They are so cozy!!!! Ruby slippers for tubin"! Nice addition to my red shoe collection!
customer_reviews.author: carolstew

customer_reviews.title: I get a new pair every year!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Emma tall boots. I normally wear a 7.5 to 8 shoe and always order about a half size bigger. There is a lot of fluff in these boots and feels great to wear for the first month or so. After a while the fluff breaks down and I normally have to wear atleast 2 pairs of socks for them to fit. But they are very warm and very comfortable and the outside looks like brand new still (helps to spray them with water repellent spry). Just don't expect them to last.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: But smaller size bc this material does stretch as time goes by. We’ve owned enough pairs that we have learned to buy smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nicole Kamstra

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Wear 7.5 bought an 8.. should of gone up more. Normal socks ok, but too tight for thick. Runs small.
customer_reviews.author: bj rose

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are so comfortable and sturdy. I wear a 8.5 in a shoe but in boots I wear a 9 so that’s what I ordered and they fit perfectly. They are so warm.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton Caudill

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 9 but it fit me great. It’s so warm and looks great. Sole is made very well. I’m very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: J. sanders

customer_reviews.title: to my surprise I ordered my size and they fit perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ordering boots online because I always thought I needed to try them on, but......to my surprise I ordered my size and they fit perfect!!! I can even wear thick socks if I wish. They are very comfortable as I wear them all day long when the weather dictates. I ordered the purple ones and they are a very nice color in person. There is some arch support; however, subtle. They are good quality as well!
customer_reviews.author: Keyboard Girl

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: Beats Ugg no matter what in my opinion. Very well made, high-end materials and oh so comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: The Fifth of VA

customer_reviews.title: Nice love Bearpaw
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my daughter and she loved them, I did get a half size bigger and that was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Order up a size!!
customer_reviews.text: Boots are ok, they look nice. Very stiff when you get them though, hopefully they’ll break in over time. Also order up a full size! I normally wear a 8.5 or 9, I ended up needing a 9.5. Overall I’d say they’re worth the $50.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa White

customer_reviews.title: Boots not so much...customer service yes and w/a smile
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these boots a while back. They did not fit at all. They were much too large and appeared to be poorly made. That being said, I returned them. Fusion Apparel, seeing that I was displeased with the purchase, went out of their way to be accommodating with my next order. Sometimes customer service is more, if not as, important than the product itself. That alone will keep you coming back to a servicer. Thank you FusionApparel for doing right by me.
customer_reviews.author: lilypudding

customer_reviews.title: Way too snug - Not a true size 12
customer_reviews.text: These are well made; however, the sizing is off. I purchased a size 12 hoping for some extra wiggle room and was very surprised to find out they were actually smaller/tighter than several other pairs of size 11 BearPaws I've owned in the past. They were too short and too tight through the instep and were the exact same length (but much tighter) than a pair of size 11 Kirkland brand that I currently own. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked Bearpaw. They hug my feet comfortably. They're cozy for a better word.❤
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: looove!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots!! My favorite! They are so soft and fit perfectly. The inside is so fuzzy, they look just like bearpaws, the come inside the box and everything. 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie ankrom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the pic! Love my boots! Size up. I wear 7.5-8. I bought a 9
customer_reviews.author: Jeep Girl Adventures

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction to lining
customer_reviews.text: The boots fit as expected, but my friends feet had an allergic reaction to the lining. Unfortunately causing us to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Terry M Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: I give these 3 stars because they really seem like good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I give these 3 stars because they really seem like good quality for the price, and the details on them look just like the more expensive brands. But I have to return them for the size--I measured my foot on paper according to the Bearpaw website, and should be a size 8, but my toes were pushing right up against the front of the boots. They're just too short, when I compare them to my size 8 UGGs, they're about 1/2" shorter sole so I'm assuming the inside is that much shorter as well. The store doesn't have the next size up so I guess the search goes on!
customer_reviews.author: I Love Target

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Smelled like chemicals, too short even though ordered my size and my toes slid forward in the box due to slant. Returned. Price was good if would have been better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality. Hems are stitched horrible
customer_reviews.text: These are either knock offs or Bearpaw boots that didn't make the cut. Very poor quality. Hems are stitched horrible. Almost too small. I ordered a 10 as I wear 9.5 and you order up. My store bought Bearpaw boots lasted 6.5 years! These won't last the rest of the winter season. Not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jardar79

customer_reviews.title: Boots
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. And she loves there boots!! They are made just the way she had hoped with a good soul. And they are lined with fir so they are very soft inside.
customer_reviews.author: Connie hakala

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This is a great boot but it arrived with many defects! There was a scuff accross the front of one boot adhesive showing on the side of rubber sole. On the other boot there are 2 holes on the side and a long scratch down the side. Very dissapointed that I was sent such a defective item.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOT
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, great price, very comfortable. I recommend this boot.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Woodbury

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 7 in shoes but I ordered an 8 and they are still very snug. I would order again in a 8.5-9 so I can move my toes around. To bad there is a 10-20 difference in price.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M. Seibel

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Always wanted a pair of bearpaws again after I had a pair back when I was younger. These are so comfy and hold up good. I live in Baltimore MD so winters are gross and salty. They are still looking pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: spetrecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots!
customer_reviews.text: I like these boots, and I love green! They are nice and warm, but my toes come right up to the end. It's not uncomfortable or anything, it's just, don't expect to be wearing them with thick socks or anything. They also don't have the best support, so I wouldn't recommend them for walking around Disneyland all day or anything. But for wearing around the house and running errands, they're fine. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kaiju wife

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a boot that was easy to pull on and off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots to wear while taking my class outside for recess. I wanted a boot that was easy to pull on and off, that was warm, and that was durable. The color is a lovely shade of deep green. The craftsmanship of the boots is solid. I like that the boots have a rubber bottom instead of foam like Uggs. They are very warm and keep my feet toasty even with the weather being -3 F. When I received my boots they felt a little small, but after wearing them a few times the lambskin stretched to fit comfortably. I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like that they're thicker and feel more substantial than uggs
customer_reviews.text: I've had these over a year and I wear them almost daily in the winter. I like that they're thicker and feel more substantial than uggs. The fuzz on the bottom of the sole came off quickly, but they're still comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Tira

customer_reviews.title: I think they're a great compromise between us
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked these out. I think they're a great compromise between us! The quality is better than a Target or Old Navy but not as pricey as Uggs. My daugher loves her pair (deep green) and says they're quite warm. I appreciate that the soles are holding up and last until we have to buy a second pair, not because they're destroyed (like an ON pair) but because she'd need a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Warm boots. Last time I purchased size 11 and that was a tad too small with socks. This time it was a size larger and it is a tad too big even with socks. But that's okay. They are comfortable and good for cold winters.
customer_reviews.author: Evelina

customer_reviews.title: Fit small
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 6 and my right foot is slightly bigger then my left. These boots were very small. The left foot was tighter then the right, which is odd since my right foot is a bit bigger. They were not tight in the calf. I too and a thin woman with thin calves. It was the foot section that fit too short at the toes. My toes bunched up at the front. This is annoying because now I have to pay for shipment back and shouldnt for poor manuf sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Leeann1

customer_reviews.title: BEARPAW Women's Emma Tall Fashion Boot
customer_reviews.text: True to size and worth every penny. Just as nice as Uggs!
customer_reviews.author: TWC

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comfy. Fits a little snug at first but stretches slightly pretty quick for the perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Joel Thoenen

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them, honestly can’t tell the difference between these and uggs
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Boots were supposed to be black but they were blue navy blue but that's okay
customer_reviews.author: Jeffro whitley

customer_reviews.title: Fit Small
customer_reviews.text: I love the boot. The quality is great,everything. Maybe I should not have read all the reviews saying to order regular size because that's what I did. I am a size 7 and I ordered a 7 but my toes are touching the ends and feel cramped. Even though I went to the Bearpaw website and used their measuring tool that said 7 is what I should order. So, I will be returning these and ordering an 8 instead.
customer_reviews.author: cmcjiff

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased bear paw at a big name store and they set me back $$$, these are AUTHENTIC AND I love the price!!!!! Bear paw box, real deal Folks!
customer_reviews.author: Chaosx5

customer_reviews.title: I love my boots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots not sure what I would be receiving. They are much less expensive than Uggs, but equal in quality as far as I am concerned. I have worn them all winter and they show no wear. They are very comfortable and warm. They seemed a bit snug when I first received them, but they fit perfectly after a few days wear, as the leather conformed to my foot. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: girlloves2read

customer_reviews.title: Cozy fur lined bear paws
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. Very cozy. Fit is perfect. I can’t wait till it gets a little cooler. I’ll get my money out of theese. Got them in two days.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Sizes aren’t true to size
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back 2 pairs because the sizes didn’t fit my wife’s feet as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bormann

customer_reviews.title: Nice, warm, cozy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the purpose purchased - nice, warm, and cozy. I'll be wearing these around on the farm when the weather get colder and because they were so affordable, I won't be worrying about a little mud here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepwalker

customer_reviews.title: They look almost like new. Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these boots a very long time, so long I forgot they were from amazon They are great. I wear iften when weather is cold in LA
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M. Burris

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots. Great for lounging around in the house and running errands.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

product_meta.title: BEARPAW Women's Emma Tall Fashion Boot
product_meta.description: This tall women's boot by BEARPAW offers a style that's well paired with denim, a casual skirt, or country dress, with a ruggedly comfortable design ideal for kicking around town. The upper is made of soft suede for a natural look, and the boot’s luxuriously cozy lining provides increased cushioning and all-over comfort.
feature_bullets: 12 inches tall and boot opening measures approximately 14 inches around
Classic low profile TPR rubber wedge outsole
Flexible Suela ^ que no deja marcas suela
Boot opening measures approximately 14 inches around
